text: 5.8 Ais 59.17, Epe 6.13-17 Pen chɨn binɨb mɨlek adek sɨŋak sek subnab sɨŋak sek mɨdobun okok, gos nɨgɨlɨg yonɨgun. Klays nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd, binɨb okok kɨlop mapen lɨl gɨpun ak nɨm, chech kɨles tɨmel sek kadɨŋ ak tek lɨnɨgun. Klays adɨkɨd apɨl chɨnop tɨg asɨk dɨnɨgab ak pelpel kod mɨdobun ak nɨm, poj kɨles tɨmel sek kadɨŋ ak tek lɨnɨgun.
